thread.title: Government extends e-Tourist Visa scheme to 36 more countries and 7 more airports fr
thread.title_full: Government extends e-Tourist Visa scheme to 36 more countries and 7 more airports fr

author: homagnibhatt
title: Government extends e-Tourist Visa scheme to 36 more countries and 7 more airports fr
text: 35. Uruguay 36. Venezuela With this addition, the total count of countries under the scheme will go upto 113 (One hundred Thirteen). Simultaneously, the Centre is going to add 7 more Indian airports as designated airports for entry on e-Tourist Visa from August 15, 2015. New Airports being included in the scheme are: 1. Ahmedabad
